mapper.select: /* getListDesignLayerFileInfo */ SELECT A.*, B.design_layer_name FROM design_layer_file_info A, design_layer B WHERE A.design_layer_id = B.design_layer_id AND A.design_layer_id = #{designLayerId} AND A.file_ext = 'shp' ORDER BY A.update_date DESC
/* getDesignLayerFileInfo */ SELECT * FROM design_layer_file_info WHERE design_layer_file_info_id = #{designLayerFileInfoId}
/* getDesignLayerFileInfoTeam */ SELECT * FROM design_layer_file_info WHERE design_layer_file_info_team_id = #{designLayerFileInfoTeamId}
/* isDesignLayerFileInfoExist */ SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM design_layer_file_info WHERE design_layer_id = #{designLayerId})
/* getMaxFileVersion */ SELECT MAX(version_id) FROM design_layer_file_info WHERE design_layer_id = #{designLayerId}
mapper.update: /* updateDesignLayerFileInfoAllDisabledByDesignLayerId */ UPDATE design_layer_file_info SET enable_yn = 'N' WHERE design_layer_id = #{designLayerId}
mapper.delete: /* deleteDesignLayerFileInfo */ DELETE FROM design_layer_file_info WHERE design_layer_id = #{designLayerId}
/* deleteDesignLayerFileInfoByTeamId */ DELETE FROM design_layer_file_info WHERE design_layer_file_info_team_id = #{designLayerFileInfoTeamId}
